title: User Registration with valid credentials
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email and strong password.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid email address and strong password
Submit the registration form
Verify registration success message or automatic login

title: User Registration with invalid email format
description: Ensure the system shows an error when user attempts registration with an invalid email format.

steps.description: Open registration page
Input invalid email and valid password
Submit registration form
Verify that an appropriate email format error message is displayed

title: User Login with correct credentials
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully with the correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click login button
Ensure user is redirected to home/dashboard page

title: User Login with incorrect password
description: Ensure login attempt fails with an incorrect password and appropriate error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify login failure message is displayed

title: Access protected routes without authentication
description: Verify that accessing dashboard, settings, or saved summaries pages without login redirects to login page.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to /dashboard
Verify redirect to login page
Attempt to navigate directly to /settings
Verify redirect to login page
Attempt to navigate directly to /saved-summaries
Verify redirect to login page

title: Submit valid YouTube URL for transcription
description: Check that submitting a valid YouTube link initiates audio extraction and transcription correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to home page
Enter a valid YouTube video URL
Select AI provider (Google Gemini or OpenAI)
Submit for transcription
Verify real-time progress updates show extraction, transcription, and summarization stages
Confirm transcription, summary, and key topics appear after processing

title: Upload supported audio file for transcription
description: Verify that uploading a supported audio file triggers transcription and summarization using the selected AI provider.

steps.description: Login and navigate to home page
Upload a supported audio format file
Select AI provider
Submit for processing
Check real-time streaming progress bar updates
Validate full transcription, summary, and key topics are displayed upon completion

title: Submit invalid YouTube URL
description: Ensure that submitting an invalid or malformed YouTube URL prompts a user-friendly error message without system crash.

steps.description: Login and access home page
Enter an invalid YouTube URL string
Attempt transcription submission
Verify an error notification indicating invalid URL format appears

title: Upload unsupported audio file format
description: Confirm system blocks upload of unsupported audio file types and displays appropriate error message.

steps.description: Login and go to home page
Attempt to upload unsupported file format (e.g., .exe or .txt)
Verify error dialog stating unsupported file format is shown

title: Real-time progress streaming accuracy
description: Validate that progress updates for extraction, transcription, and summarization are streamed in real-time with no significant delays.

steps.description: Initiate transcription from YouTube URL or upload
Observe live progress updates continuously representing extraction, transcription, and summarization stages
Confirm updates end promptly when processing completes

title: Save and retrieve transcription results
description: Ensure that after transcription completes, the full transcription, summary, and key topics are correctly saved and can be retrieved from the dashboard or saved summaries archive.

steps.description: Complete a transcription job
Navigate to dashboard and reviewed saved entries
Verify the transcription, summary, and key topics appear and match original output
Open saved summaries page
Confirm the previously saved items are listed and accessible

title: Manage AI provider API keys securely
description: Verify users can add, update, and retrieve their Google Gemini and OpenAI API keys in the settings page securely.

steps.description: Login and go to settings page
Add a valid API key for Google Gemini
Save the API key
Verify the API key is saved and shown securely (masked or encrypted if applicable)
Update the OpenAI API key with new value
Confirm updates are persisted and retrieved accurately on page reload

title: Ensure temporary uploaded audio files are deleted after processing
description: Verify that audio files uploaded for processing are removed from temporary storage after transcription completes to conserve storage.

steps.description: Perform an audio file upload and transcription
Check server or storage to confirm temporary audio file is deleted after processing

title: UI responsiveness and rendering across supported browsers
description: Validate that all UI components render correctly and remain usable across widely used browsers and device screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on latest Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari browsers
Verify UI components render properly without misalignment or visual defects
Test UI responsiveness by resizing window or using mobile device emulator
Ensure layouts adjust correctly and remain usable on various screen resolutions

title: Error handling for AI provider failures
description: Simulate AI provider API failures or invalid API keys and verify user receives clear error feedback without app crash.

steps.description: Configure invalid or expired API key in settings
Initiate a transcription job
Observe graceful error message indicating AI provider failure or invalid API key
Confirm app continues functioning normally after error

title: Switching between AI providers for transcription
description: Validate that user can select either Google Gemini or OpenAI providers before transcription and receive output accordingly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to home page
Input valid media input (YouTube URL or file)
Select Google Gemini as AI provider and submit
Verify transcription and summary results are returned
Repeat with OpenAI selected as provider
Ensure transcription output is generated and displayed correctly

title: Verify clear user flow from landing to results display
description: Test the overall user journey from landing page authentication through media input, processing, to results view is seamless and intuitive.

steps.description: Access landing page
Register/login successfully
Navigate to home/dashboard
Submit media input and select AI provider
Observe real-time progress until transcription and summarization complete
Verify results display and ability to browse saved summaries
Navigate to settings and update API keys
Confirm smooth navigation and UI consistency throughout flow
